member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadEntityFrameworkCoreDataSource
member.summary: Provides an object for loading, paging, filtering, sorting, and editing entities coming from EntityFrameworkCore's DbContext.

member.summary: Gets or sets the instance used for executing the load and submit operations.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the query to use for loading.

member.summary: Gets the filter descriptors used for filtering operations.

member.value: The current view of entities resulting from the last load operation.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadEntityFrameworkCoreDataSource.RelatedObjects
member.summary: The names of the related entities.
member.remarks: For example, if your main entity set is called "Orders", you might want to add "OrderDetails" to this collection in case you want to get the related OrderDetails for each Order from the database.
member.value: The names of the related entities.
